CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Life Time Group Holdings Inc is engaged in designing, building, and operating distinctive and large, multi-use sports and athletic, professional fitness, family recreation and spa centres in a resort-like environment, principally in residential locations of major metropolitan areas in the United States and Canada.
